alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:56PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Weld and northwestern Adams Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 555 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Evans to 3 miles south of Barr Lake, or along a line extending from near Greeley to 15 miles northeast of Denver. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greeley, northeastern Commerce City, Brighton, Evans, northern Denver International Airport, Fort Lupton, Lochbuie, Eaton, Hudson, LaSalle, Ault, Kersey, Barr Lake, Milton Reservoir and Lucerne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If a tornado is spotted seek shelter inside a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
